info.title: viral.app API
info.description:
API for viral.app - Short-form video analytics platform for TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube.

Authenticate using your API key in the `x-api-key` header. Get your API key from [API Keys](/app/api/keys) in the viral.app dashboard.

apiKeyAuth.name: x-api-key
apiKeyAuth.description:
API key authentication. Use your API key in the x-api-key header.

To obtain an API key:
1. Log into viral.app
2. Navigate to Settings > API Keys
3. Create a new API key
4. Use the key in the x-api-key header

tags.name: Tracked Individual Videos
tags.description: Manage and monitor individual tracked videos

get.description: Retrieves paginated accounts with comprehensive analytics including profile data (followers, following, display name), computed metrics (total views, engagement rate, virality rate), and tracking metadata. Supports sorting, searching by username, and filtering by platforms, projects, and date ranges.

maxVideos.description: Maximum number of videos to track for this account

lastErrorAt.description: Timestamp of last sync error, if any

lastErrorCode.description: Error code from last failed sync attempt

createdAt.description: When this account tracking was created

updatedAt.description: When this account tracking was last updated

userId.description: ID of the user who added this account

orgId.description: Organization that owns this account tracking

loadAt.description: Timestamp when account data was last loaded

followerCount.description: Number of followers for this account

followingCount.description: Number of accounts this account is following

profilePictureUrl.description: URL to the account's profile picture

countryCode.description: Country code where the account is based

viralityRate.description: Rate of viral content based on performance thresholds

totalVideos.description: Total number of videos published by this account

totalVideosTracked.description: Count of videos actively tracked within the max videos setting

totalVideosRetained.description: Count of historic videos retained beyond the active tracking limit

totalViews.description: Total lifetime views across all videos

totalLikes.description: Total lifetime likes across all videos

totalComments.description: Total lifetime comments across all videos

totalShares.description: Total lifetime shares across all videos

totalBookmarks.description: Total lifetime bookmarks across all videos

highestViews.description: View count of the most-viewed video

averageViewsPerVideo.description: Average views per video across all content

latestVideoPublishedAt.description: Timestamp of when the latest video was published

daysSinceLastPost.description: Number of days since the last video was published

maxVideos.description: Maximum number of videos to track

updatedAt.description: When this account tracking was last updated

lastErrorCode.description: Error code from last failed sync attempt

post.description: Exports accounts data as CSV with presigned download URL. Includes profile data, analytics metrics, tracking metadata, and computed performance indicators. Respects all filtering options (search, platforms, projects, date ranges). Returns secure download URL valid for 5 minutes.

get.description: Retrieves comprehensive video details including metadata (title, caption, hashtags, music), analytics metrics (views, likes, engagement rate), account information, and content properties. Includes platform-specific data and computed performance indicators.

schema.description: Native platform video id found in the URL of the video

Organization creator ID with orgcre_ prefix

get.description: Fetches a temporary MP4 download link for a specific TikTok, Instagram, or YouTube video. Requires an Ultra or Enterprise plan.

schema.description: Native platform video id found in the URL of the video
Direct HTTPS MP4 URL for the requested video plus a flag indicating if an extra credit was consumed. Links may include query parameters for authorization and can expire.

message.default: Video download is not supported for this platform

get.summary: List all tracked videos with analytics
get.description: Retrieves paginated videos with comprehensive analytics data. Supports filtering by platforms (TikTok, Instagram, YouTube), accounts, content types, projects, and date ranges.

schema.description: Expand related resources in the response

projects.description: Projects linked to the video. Returns project IDs by default, or full objects when using expand[]=projects.

data.description: Array of video objects with comprehensive analytics and metadata

schema.description: Paginated response containing videos with analytics data and pagination metadata

get.summary: List all creators with user information
get.description: Retrieves paginated creators with comprehensive user data including names, emails, and profile information. Supports searching by creator name or email address. Returns creator metadata with associated user details for organization management, campaign assignment, and collaboration workflows.

post.description: Creates a new creator user and associates them with the organization. The creator will not have authentication credentials initially and would need to be invited or set up auth separately.

items.description: Organization account ID with orgacc_ prefix. Not the same as platform account ID.

message.default: This user already has a non-creator membership in an organization
This creator already exists in this organization

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific creator including comprehensive user data, invitation status, associated tracked social media accounts, and profile information. Returns null if the creator is not found or doesn't belong to your organization. This endpoint provides all necessary data for viewing creator profiles and managing creator-account associations.

schema.description: Organization creator ID with orgcre_ prefix
Creator details with user information, accounts, and invitation status. Returns null if creator not found or doesn't belong to organization.

examples.notes: Fashion content creator specializing in sustainable brands

message.default: Creator not found or doesn't belong to your organization

put.description: Updates creator user information including first name, last name, and email address. The creator must exist in the organization and the email must not be in use by another user.

schema.description: Organization creator ID with orgcre_ prefix

items.description: Organization account ID with orgacc_ prefix. Not the same as platform account ID.

schema.description: Request to update an existing creator

message.default: Cannot update name or email for verified users. User manages their own profile.
Creator not found in this organization
Email address is already in use by another user

delete.description: Deletes a creator from the organization. If the user has not verified their email and this is their only creator profile, the user account will also be deleted. Otherwise, only the creator profile and membership are removed.

schema.description: The organization creator ID to delete
Parameters for deleting a creator from the organization

success.description: Indicates if the operation was successful

deletedUser.description: Indicates if the user account was also deleted (true when user had unverified email and this was their only creator profile)

message.description: Optional message describing the operation result

examples.message: Creator and user account deleted successfully

message.default: Creator not found in this organization

post.description: Sends an invitation email to a creator with the 'creator' role. The creator must exist in the organization and have a valid email address. Supports resending invitations.

schema.description: The organization creator ID to invite

resend.description: Whether to resend the invitation if one already exists

schema.description: Parameters for inviting a creator to the organization

message.default: Creator not found in this organization

delete.description: Cancels a pending invitation for a creator. The invitation must belong to the current organization. This removes the invitation from the system and prevents the creator from accepting it.

schema.description: Parameters for revoking a creator invitation

message.default: This invitation does not belong to your organization

post.description: Replaces all tracked account associations for a creator with the provided list. Supports force override to reassign accounts from other creators.

schema.description: Organization creator ID with orgcre_ prefix

items.description: Organization account ID with orgacc_ prefix. Not the same as platform account ID.
Organization account ID with orgacc_ prefix. Not the same as platform account ID.

message.default: Creator not found in this organization
Some accounts were not found or don't belong to this organization
Some accounts are already assigned to other creators.

get.summary: Get top performing videos by metrics
get.description: Retrieves top performing videos ranked by specified metrics. Supports both lifetime totals (viewCount, likeCount) and period-specific gains (viewCountInPeriod, likeCountInPeriod). Filter by platforms, accounts, projects, and publication date. Set onlyPublished=true to include only videos published within the date range.

schema.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-100)
Whether to only include content published within the date range
Metric to sort videos by. Supports both lifetime totals and period-specific gains

anyOf.description: Organization account ID with orgacc_ prefix. Not the same as platform account ID.

tracking_status.description: Tracking status indicator: 1 for actively tracked entries, 0 for retained historic data

viewCountInPeriod.description: Total views gained during the specified date range

likeCountInPeriod.description: Total likes gained during the specified date range

commentCountInPeriod.description: Total comments gained during the specified date range

shareCountInPeriod.description: Total shares gained during the specified date range

bookmarkCountInPeriod.description: Total bookmarks gained during the specified date range

engagementRateInPeriod.description: Engagement rate calculated from period gains (likes+comments+shares+bookmarks)/views

schema.description: Array of top performing videos with both lifetime totals and period-specific metrics

get.summary: Get top performing accounts by metrics
get.description: Retrieves top performing accounts ranked by specified metrics. Includes lifetime totals (viewCount, engagementRate) and period-specific gains (viewCountInPeriod, videoCountInPeriod). Returns account analytics including follower counts, posting frequency, and performance averages. Filter by platforms, accounts, projects, and content types.

schema.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-100)
Whether to only include content published within the date range
Metric to sort accounts by. Supports both lifetime totals and period-specific gains

id.description: Organization account ID with orgacc_ prefix. Not the same as platform account ID.

followerCount.description: Number of followers for this account

followingCount.description: Number of accounts this account is following

profilePictureUrl.description: URL to the account's profile picture

likeCount.description: Total lifetime likes across all videos

commentCount.description: Total lifetime comments across all videos

shareCount.description: Total lifetime shares across all videos

bookmarkCount.description: Total lifetime bookmarks across all videos

videoCount.description: Total number of videos published by this account

averageViewsPerVideo.description: Average views per video across all content

viralityRate.description: Rate of viral content based on performance thresholds

highestViews.description: View count of the most-viewed video

latestVideoPublishedAt.description: Timestamp of when the latest video was published

daysSinceLastPost.description: Number of days since the last video was published

maxVideos.description: Maximum number of videos to track for this account

createdAt.description: When this account tracking was created

updatedAt.description: When this account tracking was last updated

user.description: Internal tracking metadata for this account

viewCountInPeriod.description: Total views gained during the specified date range

likeCountInPeriod.description: Total likes gained during the specified date range

commentCountInPeriod.description: Total comments gained during the specified date range

shareCountInPeriod.description: Total shares gained during the specified date range

bookmarkCountInPeriod.description: Total bookmarks gained during the specified date range

videoCountInPeriod.description: Number of videos published during the specified date range

averageViewsPerVideoInPeriod.description: Average views per video for content published in the period

engagementRateInPeriod.description: Engagement rate calculated from period gains (likes+comments+shares+bookmarks)/views

items.description: Account performance data with both lifetime totals and period-specific metrics

schema.description: Array of top performing tracked accounts with comprehensive analytics

get.summary: Get top performing creators by aggregated metrics
get.description: Retrieves top performing creators ranked by specified metrics aggregated across all their linked accounts. Includes lifetime totals (viewCount, engagementRate) and period-specific gains (viewCountInPeriod, videoCountInPeriod). Returns creator details, user information, and all linked accounts. Metrics are summed across all accounts for comprehensive creator performance analysis. Filter by platforms, accounts, projects, and content types.

schema.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-100)
Whether to only include content published within the date range
Metric to sort creators by. Supports both lifetime totals and period-specific gains. Aggregates across all linked accounts.

creatorUserId.description: The user ID of the creator

createdAt.description: When this creator was added to the organization

updatedAt.description: When this creator record was last updated

maxVideos.description: Maximum number of videos to track for this account

accounts.description: All accounts linked to this creator

viewCount.description: Total lifetime views across all creator's accounts

likeCount.description: Total lifetime likes across all creator's accounts

commentCount.description: Total lifetime comments across all creator's accounts

shareCount.description: Total lifetime shares across all creator's accounts

bookmarkCount.description: Total lifetime bookmarks across all creator's accounts

videoCount.description: Total number of videos across all creator's accounts

averageViewsPerVideo.description: Average views per video across all creator's content

engagementRate.description: Overall engagement rate (likes+comments+shares+bookmarks)/views across all accounts

followerCount.description: Total followers aggregated across all creator's linked accounts

viralityRate.description: Rate of viral content based on performance thresholds (aggregated)

viewCountInPeriod.description: Total views gained during the specified date range across all accounts

likeCountInPeriod.description: Total likes gained during the specified date range across all accounts

commentCountInPeriod.description: Total comments gained during the specified date range across all accounts

shareCountInPeriod.description: Total shares gained during the specified date range across all accounts

bookmarkCountInPeriod.description: Total bookmarks gained during the specified date range across all accounts

videoCountInPeriod.description: Number of videos published during the specified date range across all accounts

averageViewsPerVideoInPeriod.description: Average views per video for content published in the period across all accounts

engagementRateInPeriod.description: Engagement rate calculated from period gains (likes+comments+shares+bookmarks)/views across all accounts

items.description: Creator performance data aggregated across all their linked accounts, with both lifetime totals and period-specific metrics

schema.description: Array of top performing creators with comprehensive analytics aggregated from all their accounts

get.summary: Get key performance indicators with period comparison
get.description: Retrieves key performance indicators for the specified date range with automatic comparison to the previous period of equal length. Returns content metrics (video/account counts), engagement metrics (views, likes, comments, shares, bookmarks), app performance (revenue, installs), and absolute changes between periods. Filter by platforms, accounts, content types, or projects.

videoCount.description: Total number of videos tracked in the period

viewCount.description: Total video views across all content

likeCount.description: Total likes received across all videos

commentCount.description: Total comments received across all videos

appRevenue.description: Revenue generated from mobile app downloads and in-app purchases (USD)

newAppInstalls.description: Number of new mobile app installations

videoCount.description: Total number of videos tracked in the period

viewCount.description: Total video views across all content

likeCount.description: Total likes received across all videos

commentCount.description: Total comments received across all videos

appRevenue.description: Revenue generated from mobile app downloads and in-app purchases (USD)

newAppInstalls.description: Number of new mobile app installations

previous.description: KPI values from the previous period for comparison

videoCount.description: Total number of videos tracked in the period

viewCount.description: Total video views across all content

likeCount.description: Total likes received across all videos

commentCount.description: Total comments received across all videos

appRevenue.description: Revenue generated from mobile app downloads and in-app purchases (USD)

newAppInstalls.description: Number of new mobile app installations

changes.description: Absolute change values between current and previous period (current - previous)

schema.description: KPI comparison data with current period, previous period, and absolute changes

get.summary: Get daily interaction metrics with comprehensive totals
get.description: Retrieves daily interaction metrics (views, likes, comments, shares, bookmarks, app revenue, installs) with aggregated totals. Returns an array of daily metrics for time-series analysis and summary totals including unique video/account counts. Zero-filled for missing days to ensure complete time series. Filter by platforms, accounts, projects, and date range.

views.description: Total video views gained on this date

likes.description: Total likes received on this date

comments.description: Total comments received on this date

shares.description: Total shares gained on this date

bookmarks.description: Total bookmarks/saves gained on this date

appRevenue.description: Revenue generated from mobile app on this date (USD)

newAppInstalls.description: Number of new mobile app installations on this date

items.description: Daily interaction metrics for a specific date

dailyMetrics.description: Array of daily interaction metrics for each day in the date range

views.description: Total views across all videos in the period

likes.description: Total likes across all videos in the period

comments.description: Total comments across all videos in the period

shares.description: Total shares across all videos in the period

bookmarks.description: Total bookmarks/saves across all videos in the period

accounts.description: Total number of unique accounts tracked in the period

videos.description: Total number of videos tracked in the period

totals.description: Aggregated totals for the entire period

schema.description: Daily interaction metrics with aggregated totals for comprehensive analytics

post.summary: Export detailed video daily gains as CSV
post.description: Exports daily video performance metrics as CSV with presigned download URL. Includes video details, daily gains (views, likes, comments, shares, bookmarks), engagement rates, and metadata. Row-level data with one entry per video per day. Returns secure download URL valid for 5 minutes. Use narrow filters for faster processing of large datasets.

dateRange.description: Date range filter for analytics queries

schema.description: Request parameters for fetching daily interaction metrics and totals

downloadUrl.description: Presigned download URL for the CSV export file

expiresAt.description: Expiration timestamp for the download URL (typically 5 minutes)

rowCount.description: Total number of data rows included in the export file

fileName.description: Generated filename for the export (includes timestamp)

schema.description: Export file download information with presigned URL and metadata

get.description: Returns recent user-triggered sync runs including current status, timestamps, and grouping metadata. Useful for polling task execution progress.
Retrieves paginated excluded videos scoped to the active organization.

post.description: Adds videos to the exclusion list so they are hidden from analytics tables.

orgAccountId.description: Organization account ID with orgacc_ prefix. Not the same as platform account ID.

delete.description: Removes videos from the exclusion list and restores them to analytics.

items.description: Excluded video ID with excv_ prefix

get.description: Retrieves paginated integration apps (Apple, Google, etc.) with analytics data including sync times and credential information.

schema.description: Paginated response containing integrated apps with sync status and credential information
